original_text: On the Sabbaths and New Moons the people of the land are to worship in the presence of the Lord at the entrance of that gateway.
korean_text: 이 땅 백성도 안식일과 초하루에 이 문 입구에서 나 여호와 앞에 예배할 것이며

sentences.original_text: On the Sabbaths and New Moons
are to worship in the presence of the Lord
at the entrance of that gateway
